chat.msg: Welcome!
hi
Hello
Where do i need to go?
go over the stick to the tiger's island
Awsome! i have reached the leopard
very good. go under the black rock and continue to the parrot's island.
Sure, i have reached the parrot
circle the parrot counter-clock-wise and exit the island on the gray rocks.
I'm not sure what you mean
Which direction should i take?
go north (near the parrot's head) and then go south between the elephant and the parrot.
I have not reached the 3 rocks yet
ok. go over the three rocks toward the frog's island.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the frog
good.
I'm not sure what you mean
Where should i go now?
go underneath the frog and then go back west and cross over the alligator's back.
Sure, i have reached the crocodile
exit from the crocodile's mouth to the big black rock.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the big rock
go to the two gray rocks near the giraffe.
I didn't pass the elephant yet
forget the elephant, go to the giraffe.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the elephant
oh...
I didn't quite understand that
Where should i go?
well, now go to the giraffe.
Awsome! i have reached the giraffe
now continue south towards the snake over the branch-bridge.
Sure, i have reached the snake
no run into the treasure chest.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the treasure
